TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnergyServiceResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing an EnergyService along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetEnergyServiceResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetEnergyService method.
